channel.title: Trade Offs on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Trade Offs on Mark Needham

item.title: Trade Offs: Some Thoughts
item.description: As we know with software development with pretty much every decision we make or technology we choose there is a trade off that goes with making this choice as compared with choosing an alternative. I first learnt this when working with Ade a couple of years ago and while I know it to be true, I had come to believe that some practices are just non-negotiable and we should look to apply them judiciously wherever possible.
